DOC.brief_summary: All enrol subject receive one Ultherapy™ treatment . Study image obtain pre-treatment , immediate post-treatment , study follow-up visit . Enrolled subject return follow-up visit 90 day , 180 day 365 day post-treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study : Higher Density Ulthera® System Treatment With Vectoring Treatment Face Neck
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single-center clinical trial evaluate efficacy Ulthera® System provide customize , high-density , vectored Ultherapy™ treatment lift tighten skin face neck . Skin laxity change baseline assess study follow-up visit . Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale score patient satisfaction questionnaire also obtain .
